text: And one more thing, you will never open to listen to suggestions or advice from me and I realize as many times you do whatever you want and even a mistake happens you never learn from it and you repeat it and get angry with me and fight with me and not even my fault but in the end it becomes my fault. ğŸ¤·â™‚ï¸
